statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 4 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -13 \\ 16 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 15 \\ -20 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 4 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -13 \\ 16 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 15 \\ -20 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
